projects.name: Canvas Confetti
projects.description: This is a personal art portfolio site. Built with Javascript & Sass on VueJs. Used S3, Cloudfront for distribution and Github Actions for CI/CD.

projects.name: Udemy Clone Site
projects.description: A clone project which helped me learn ReactJs and NextJs. Built with Typescript, Sass on NextJs. Used GraphQL to fetch and post requests and vercel for distribution and CI/CD.

projects.name: Artwork Uploader
projects.description: Admin tool for uploading artwork for art portfolio site. Build using NestJs for the back-end and ReactJs on the front. The objects would save in an S3 bucket while saving the object url on a database.

projects.name: AWS CloudFront Invalidation Guide
projects.description: Simple how to article for AWS cloudfront invalidations.

work.description: Implemented a major features such as Cost management, Night Audit, Rate adjustment, Reservations management features etc. for property management systems (ONDA Wave), ONDA PMS.
Implemented key features of a property & reservation management tool to help operation-teams who used Postman to fetch and post reservation details.
Helped implementing web services for an Intelligent Evacuation System. Web services were able to communicate between LoRa devices, and detect hight decibel sounds such as shooting incidents.
work.stack: Java & Spring Boot (For PC application), Javascript, Express (For Web applications)

work.description: Intelligent Guidance System For Emergency Situations. Developed, tested, deployed, and maintained RESTFul APIs to deliver IoT sensory data (audio, gas, temperature) to/from gateways detect emergency situations.
